title: Italian meatballs with mozarella
methods: In a large bowl, mix together the oil, mince, chopped onion, garlic, egg, oregano, tomato purée, Parmesan, breadcrumbs and seasoning.
Mix with your fingers to combine thoroughly. Form into 24 balls, about the size of a walnut.
Preheat oven to 200°C. Place the meat balls in a shallow ovenproof casserole and cook for 15 min.
Sprinkle the flour over and gradually add stock, wine and tomatoes, stirring carefully. Return to the oven and cook for a further 15 min, stirring occasionally.
Stir in the mozzarella 5 min before the end of cooking time.
Garnish with oregano. Serve hot with freshly cooked pasta.
description: A traditional family filler, cooked in a flavoursome red wine and tomato sauce.
